mapper.insert: INSERT INTO redis_alarm_config(id,redisKey,alarmSwitch, memThreshold, qpsThreshold, connThreshold,createTime, updateTime) VALUES(#{id}, #{redisKey},#{alarmSwitch}, #{memThreshold}, #{qpsThreshold},#{connThreshold},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id,redisKey,alarmSwitch, memThreshold, qpsThreshold, connThreshold,createTime, updateTime FROM redis_alarm_config WHERE redisKey = #{redisKey} ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id,redisKey,alarmSwitch, memThreshold, qpsThreshold, connThreshold,createTime, updateTime FROM redis_alarm_config ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
